text: KIVI-TV (channel 6) is a television station licensed to Nampa, Idaho, United States, serving the Boise area as an affiliate of ABC. ==Ownership== It is owned by the E. W. Scripps Company, which provides services to Caldwell- licensed Fox affiliate KNIN-TV (channel 9), which was directly co-owned with KIVI from 2009 to 2015) under a shared services agreement (SSA) with Gray Television. ==Locations== Both stations share studios on East Chisholm Drive in Nampa (along I-84/US 30/SH-55). KIVI-TV's transmitter is at the Bogus Basin ski area summit in the Boise County. Category:American television stations Category:Idaho
title: KIVI
